item.title: Federalist CEO Sean Davis Drops Stunning Details About The Butler Trump Assassination Attempt In Tucker Carlson Interview
item.description: 'I refuse to believe this was just a series of unfortunate accidents and incompetence,' Davis said. 'It's just not.'

item.title: Noem Confirmation Hearing Highlights How Much DHS Rot She’ll Have To Clean Out
item.description: 'This has got to be the darkest chapter, I think, in DHS’s short history,' Sen. Josh Hawley said.

item.title: David Lynch’s Death Leaves A Great Void In Cinema
item.description: The surrealist cinema visionary is often known for his dark themes, but his sincerity and love of America made his work enduring.
